channel.title: Automatic server Restarter
channel.description:
Ok,
My server keeps crashing when I am at school/sleeping because of Mass clickers and the stress.
Where could I find a program that every 30mins or so automatically restarts the client thingy so people can log in again (when I say restart I mean like when you turn off server and than re-run it).
Thanks.

item.title: Automatic server Restarter
item.dc:creator: @kkjdisgod kkjdisgod
item.description:
@kkjdisgod wrote:

hey thanks i needed that to lol

when i try to use it says:
the application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). click ok to terminate the application.

please help.

Read full topic
